messages.content: Hi there! I'm Gemini, part of the General Pulse system. I'm ready to assist you with your workflow needs!

I'm General Pulse, your AI Personal Workflow Ops Assistant. I can help with:
- Tracking tasks and progress
- Checking system status
- Integrating with AI models (Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek)
- Managing GitHub repositories and issues
- Creating Notion journal entries
- Managing Notion documents
- Analyzing Notion pages

You can chat with me naturally or use direct commands by starting with '/'.

System Status:
- Agent: Active
- Available AI Models: claude, grok, deepseek, gemini
- GitHub Integration: Configured
- Tasks: Completed: 17, In Progress: 6, Pending: 8
- Last Updated: April 13, 2025
